metadata.name: Hummingbird Dance
metadata.description:
In the magic of his realm, the tiny bird is an even bigger wish, making my heart flutter as he draws near. Each bird, a different wish or imagined dream.

Title:  Hummingbird Dance
Edition: 1 of 1
Format: 1200 x 937px, 24fps, mp4
Duration: 6 seconds on an infinite loop
Year: 2021

Email karen@karensfineart.com to receive free fine art print of the image to accompany NFT.  

Thank you so much for your interest in my art!  ~Karen
